title: Bad Times at the Cozy Inn (Earl Marshall)
description:
The “Cozy” is the restaurant where everybody knows your name. But the identity of who shot the restaurant’s owner stumped investigators for decades.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
